law.history: Repealed 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 26. -- Created 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) ch. 7, Article IV, sec. 4; effective July 1, 1956.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Agency appointing officer to notify department of change of status of employe; Department of Finance may demand supporting information prior to payment of compensation.
